text:
In performance testing, when I send a HTTP request to back end system, there a 
delay of 5 seconds.Say if I use one thread then I cannot send the second 
request unless the thread gets the response for the first request.

When I try to configure 5 threads sending the message every next second, say 
1,2,3,4,5s so that when the 5th message is sent by then first message is back. 
This way message will be sent continuosly.

The problem is when I set the scenario using ramp-up or the scheduler, I see  
most of the times it waits for 3-4 seconds which does not similate the live 
scenario where different clients will access the system. 

Is this difficult to simulate.
creator: vincent.arokiaraj@bt.com

text:
As far as I can tell, this is not a bug report. Please ask usage questions on 
the JMeter user list.
creator: sebb@apache.org
